= Class *jplex.xprototype.Element*  =

== Description ==
jPlex's XPrototype extended DOM Element


== Properties ==         
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| _getOffsetParent_ || object || `- `Bug-fixed getOffsetParent (see Prototype Issue #365)||



== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `appendChildren(Elements)` || `Element` || Appends all elements listed as arguments to the DOM element<br />  - `Elements <List<Element>>` to add<br/>||
|| `bindKey(key, handler, config)` || `Element` || Bind a key event on an element<br />  - `key <int>` Key-Code (see Event)<br/> - `handler <Function>`<br/> - `config <Object>` This object is a boolean property hash object containing: `ctrl`, `shift`, `alt` and `preventDefault` (enough explicit)<br/>||
|| `IEFixCombobox()` || `void` || Inserts a hidden iframe behind the element to correct the Combobox bug (an absolute `div` goes under a comboxbox) <br/>that happens only in Internet Explorer 6. The Calendar component exploits this function to fix the bug for instance.<br /> ||
|| `isWithin(x, y)` || `Boolean` || Determines wheter the point of coordinates (x,y) on the page is within the element or not<br />  - `x <Integer>` Horizontal coordinate<br/> - `y <Integer>` Vertical coordinate<br/>||
|| `removeChildren()` || `Element` || Removes all children of the element<br /> ||
|| `unbindKey(key, modifiers)` || `Element` || Unbind a key on the element<br />  - `key <int>` Key-Code (see Event)<br/> - `modifiers <Object>` Same form as `config` in `bindKey`<br/>||
